nodes.text: The TX-225 Occupier was a line of assault tanks manufactured by Rothana Heavy Engineering for the Galactic Empire. Two versions of the tank were created: the TX-225 GAVw, and the TX-225 GAVr. Both were piloted by Imperial combat assault tank pilots.
The TX-225 GAVw had a continuous track assembly for propulsion. That model notably saw use on Jedha. Although efficient, its complex track mechanism required heavy maintenance.
The TX-225 GAVr was fitted with repulsorlifts that made it hover slightly above the ground. It was less stable than the tracked model.
